faq.question: What length should I choose?
faq.answer: Brief (30 sec) for fast-paced podcasts, standard (1 min) for most shows, and extended (2 min) for keynotes and formal events.

faq.question: How do I match the show's tone?
faq.answer: Listen to a few episodes to gauge the energy. Use energetic for upbeat shows, professional for business podcasts, and casual for conversational formats.

faq.question: Should I include my discussion topic?
faq.answer: Yes! Including your topic helps the host transition smoothly from your intro into the conversation.

faq.question: When should I send my intro to the host?
faq.answer: Send your intro at least 24 hours before the recording, along with any other materials like photos or links.
